name: praszad.com
description: Praszad frontend Web developer with 3+ years of experience in React, Angular and PHP

scripts.copy: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && cp -r src/* build/ && cp -r src/.well-known build/.well-known
scripts.minify-html: htmlminify src/index.html > build/index.html && htmlminify src/privacy-policy.html > build/privacy-policy.html
scripts.minify-css: postcss src/css/main.css > build/css/main.css && postcss src/css/fontawesome/css/all.css > build/css/fontawesome/css/all.css
scripts.minify-js: minify src/cache-polyfill.js > build/cache-polyfill.js && minify src/sw.js > build/sw.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run minify

author: prasad babu
